description: "Starfield" is a endless starfield animation. This is a demo application of html5 (Canvas & JavaScript).  You may change the "flight" direction with your finger.  Just use it - It´s simple!   ** Update 3 **  - Added a new color function. Shake function removed. Save and restore settings.    ** Update 2 **  - Added a "Stardust" option. Pause function added. Code optimized for better performance.    ** Update **  - Added options. Double tap on the screen opens the menu. You can edit different things like Star speed, accelerometer support, star count and star color.
